memberdef.argsstring: (const char *username, const char *userid, const char *passwd, const char *ha1, const char *realm, const char *domain)
memberdef.name: sephone_auth_info_new

detaileddescription.para:
Creates a #SephoneAuthInfo object with supplied information. The object can be created empty, that is with all arguments set to NULL. Username, userid, password, realm and domain can be set later using specific methods. At the end, username and passwd (or ha1) are required.
username
The username that needs to be authenticated
userid
The userid used for authenticating (use NULL if you don't know what it is)
passwd
The password in clear text
ha1
The ha1-encrypted password if password is not given in clear text.
realm
The authentication domain (which can be larger than the sip domain. Unfortunately many SIP servers don't use this parameter.
domain
The SIP domain for which this authentication information is valid, if it has to be restricted for a single SIP domain.
A #SephoneAuthInfo object. sephone_auth_info_destroy() must be used to destroy it when no longer needed. The SephoneCore makes a copy of SephoneAuthInfo passed through sephone_core_add_auth_info().
Gets the username.
Gets the password.
Gets the userid.
Gets the realm.
Gets the domain.
Gets the ha1.

Sets the password.
info
The #SephoneAuthInfo object
passwd
The password.

Sets the username.
info
The #SephoneAuthInfo object
username
The username.

Sets the userid.
info
The #SephoneAuthInfo object
userid
The userid.

Sets the realm.
info
The #SephoneAuthInfo object
realm
The realm.

Sets the domain for which this authentication is valid.
info
The #SephoneAuthInfo object
domain
The domain. This should not be necessary because realm is supposed to be unique and sufficient. However, many SIP servers don't set realm correctly, then domain has to be used to distinguish between several SIP account bearing the same username.

Sets the ha1.
info
The #SephoneAuthInfo object
ha1
The ha1.
Destroys a SephoneAuthInfo object.

memberdef.argsstring: (SephoneCore *lc, const char *username, const char *realm, const char *domain)
memberdef.name: find_auth_info

memberdef.argsstring: (SephoneCore *lc, const char *realm, const char *username, const char *domain)
memberdef.name: sephone_core_find_auth_info

detaileddescription.para:
Find authentication info matching realm, username, domain criteria. First of all, (realm,username) pair are searched. If multiple results (which should not happen because realm are supposed to be unique), then domain is added to the search.
lc
the SephoneCore
realm
the authentication 'realm' (optional)
username
the SIP username to be authenticated (mandatory)
domain
the SIP domain name (optional)
a #SephoneAuthInfo

memberdef.argsstring: (SephoneCore *lc, const char *username, const char *userid, const char *passwd, const char *ha1, const char *realm, const char *domain)
memberdef.name: sephone_core_create_auth_info

detaileddescription.para:
Create an authentication information with default values from Sephone core.
lc
SephoneCore object
username
String containing the username part of the authentication credentials
userid
String containing the username to use to calculate the authentication digest (optional)
passwd
String containing the password of the authentication credentials (optional, either passwd or ha1 must be set)
ha1
String containing a ha1 hash of the password (optional, either passwd or ha1 must be set)
realm
String used to discriminate different SIP authentication domains (optional)
domain
String containing the SIP domain for which this authentication information is valid, if it has to be restricted for a single SIP domain.
#SephoneAuthInfo with default values set
Adds authentication information to the SephoneCore.
This information will be used during all SIP transactions that require authentication.
This method is used to abort a user authentication request initiated by SephoneCore from the auth_info_requested callback of SephoneCoreVTable.
Removes an authentication information object.

Returns an unmodifiable list of currently entered SephoneAuthInfo.
lc
The SephoneCore object
A list of SephoneAuthInfo objects. SephoneAuthInfo
Clear all authentication information.
